title: Child Care: A Comprehensive Guide: Model Programs and Their Components (2)
description: Stevanne Auerbach , PhD., Teacher; Program Specialist at the U.S. Department of Education, approved the first grant for "Sesame Street," evaluated "Title One Programs," established first model childcare center, testified before Congressional Committee (1969); At the Office of Equal Opportunity, planned national childcare program, coordinated Childcare Forum at the White House Conference on Children (1970); Childcare Advocate; Author,15 books on parenting, childcare, toys; Cross-Cultural Study Childcare Services (1974), Choosing Childcare (1976), Child Comprehensive Guide (1975-1979), Confronting Childcare Crisis (1979); Consults, evaluates, reviews toys and products for www.drtoy.com.
author: Stevanne Auerbach
